title: Lag but ping/fps is fine?
body:
Hey guys just thought I'd report this, just playing norms and my ping is perfectly fine (confirmed net is fine with youtube 1080p vids and speedtest 10mbps) and fps is 100 like usual, but I'm getting lag, I even dc'd for about 30 seconds, completely random no idea how or why, also computer isn't running any scans or anything so yeah just thought I'd say something in case anyone else is getting this.

OutMagic

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you please do the following for me;

* [Switch to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5)
* [Download WinMTR](https://sourceforge.net/projects/winmtr/files/WinMTR-v092.zip/download) and run a traceroute to the following IP. (Allow this to run for 5-15 minutes)
  * 103.240.227.5
* Once adequate time has passed, stop the traceroute, export your results as text.
* Run the [ICSI netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/).
* Post back with a link to your WinMTR results (You can use [pastebin](http://pastebin.com/) for this) and the direct url to your ICSI netalyzr results.

Hey SephirothSG, so later that day I continued playing norms and it seemed to stop acting up, been playing league daily (like 5+games) and haven't had an issue since so thought I'd let you know that it's all good now :D :D
